description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Play Team Drinkards simulation of a classic college drinking game! Powerful 3D physics make each throw a thrill while you compete with friends - at home or on Xbox LIVE. Set the House Rules for Re-Racks, Bounces, Overtime, and Island Shots! Hone your skill against AI and a Global Score list! Unlock 3 venues and 25 tables! Crack a can or pop a bottle, but please play Beer Pong/Beirut responsibly.
